document.docAuthor: Moya-Arévalo, Rosa Helena, Ibáñez-Bernal, Sergio & Suárez-Landa, María Teresa
document.masterDocTitle: First record of Didicrum Enderlein (Diptera: Psychodidae, Psychodinae) from the Northern Andes bioregion, with the description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: First record of Didicrum Enderlein (Diptera: Psychodidae, Psychodinae) from the Northern Andes bioregion, with the description of a new species

bibRefCitation.author: Enderlein
bibRefCitation.refString: Enderlein, G. (1937) Klassifikation der Psychodiden. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift, 1936, 81 - 112.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Didicrum
Enderlein 1937
, 105. Type species:
Pericoma griseata Tonnoir
(orig. des.). Additional references:
Quate 1963
, 184;
Duckhouse 1990
, 734;
Brown & Quate 2004
, 9.

Syn. Podolepria
Enderlein 1937
, 105. Type species:
Pericoma inornata Tonnoir
(orig. des.). Syn.
Mecysmia
Enderlein 1937
, 106. Type species:
Pericoma schoenemanni Enderlein
(org. des.).

Didicrum agreste (
Quate & Quate) 1967
, 39, figs. 15g –i, as
Pericoma agrestis
( 3 ). Type locality: NE of NEW
GUINEA
, Bulolo Gorge, between Bulolo and Wau (
7 ° 20 ´S
,
146 ° 43 ´E
). Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution: NEW
GUINEA
.

Didicrum clarkei (
Satchell) 1954
, 480, figs. 1 a–f, as
Pericoma
( 3 ). Type locality:
NEW ZEALAND
, Hump Mt. ( 52 miles directly WNW of Invercargill); Harris Saddle near Nelson. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
.

Didicrum claviatum (
Satchell) 1950
, 156, figs. 7 a–d, as
Pericoma claviata
( 3 ). Type locality:
NEW ZEALAND
, Lake Moana. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
.

Didicrum colombensis Moya
–Arévalo & Ibáñez–Bernal sp. nov. ( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: COLOMBIA : Cundinamarca, PNN Chingaza, Bosque Palacio (
4 ° 31 ´N
,
73 ° 45 ´W
); Boyacá, SNFF Iguaque, Arcabuco, Cabañas Mamarramos. Distribution: COLOMBIA , as mentioned.

Didicrum contiguum (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 24, pl. III, figs. 51–53 , as
Pericoma contigua
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: ARGENTINA , Río Negro, Puerto Blest, Lago Nahuel Huapi. Additional references:
Enderlein 1937
, 24, as
Didicrum
;
Quate 1963
, 185, as
Didicrum
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 11, figs. 13, 14 , as
Didicrum
;
Omad & Rossi 2012
, 66 (listed). Distribution: ARGENTINA , Río Negro (Puerto Blest at Lago Nahuel Huapi) (
Quate & Brown 2004
).

Didicrum deceptrix
Quate & Brown 2004
, 11, figs. 10–12 ( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: CHILE , Llanquihue, Yerbas Buenas. Distribution: CHILE (only the type locality).

Didicrum drepanatum (
Satchell) 1950
, 156, figs. 8 a–d, as
Pericoma depranata
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality:
NEW ZEALAND
, Tasman, Mt. Arthur. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
.

Didicrum fenestratum (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 20, pl. II, figs. 37–39 , as
Pericoma fenestrata
(Ƥ). Type locality: CHILE , Llanquihue, Casa Pangue. Additional references:
Enderlein 1937
, 92, as
Synseodais fenestrata
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 12, figs. 23–24 , as
Didicrum fenestratum
. Distribution: CHILE : Llanquihue, Casa Pangue and Yerbas Buenas.

Didicrum griseatum (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 22, pl. III, figs. 42–45 , as
Pericoma griseata
(Ƥ). Type locality: CHILE , Chiloe Island, Ancud. Additional references:
Enderlein 1937
, 105, as
Didicrum
;
Quate 1963
, 184, as
Didicrum
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 9, fig. 2 , as
Didicrum .
Distribution: CHILE , only the type locality (
Quate & Brown 2004
).

Didicrum inornatum (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 23, pl. III, figs. 40–50 , as
Pericoma inornata
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: ARGENTINA , Río Negro, Puerto Blest, lago Nahuel Huapi. Additional references:
Enderlein 1937
, 105, as Podolepria ;
Quate 1963
, 185, as
Didicrum
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 10, figs. 3–5 , as
Didicrum
;
Omad & Rossi 2012
, 66 (listed). Distribution: ARGENTINA , Río Negro (Puerto Blest, Lago Nahuel Huapi and Lago Mascardi, Provincia de Neuquén (arroyo Quechaquina at N side Lago Lacar; San Martín de los Andes at Lago Huechulafquen); CHILE , Llanquihue (Yerbas Buenas) (
Quate & Brown 2004
).

Didicrum maurum (
Satchell) 1950
, 157, figs. 9 a–g, as
Pericoma maura
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality:
NEW ZEALAND
, Aniseed Valley. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
.

Didicrum peregrinum (
Quate & Quate) 1967
, 39, figs. 16 a–e, as
Pericoma peregrina
( 3 ). Type locality: NE of NEW
GUINEA
, Baitabag (
5 ° 13 ´S
,
145 ° 35 ´E
). Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution: NEW
GUINEA
.

Didicrum punctulatum (Tonnoir)
1953, 421 , as
Pericoma punctulata
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: AUSTRALIA , Sassafras ( holotype ), Ferntree Gully (allotype). Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution: AUSTRALIA (Victoria).

Didicrum pyramidon
Quate & Brown 2004
, 12, figs. 18–22 ( 3 ). Type locality: ARGENTINA , Neuquén, 18 km NW San Martín de los Andes. Distribution: ARGENTINA , only the type locality. Additional references:
Omad & Rossi 2012
, 66 (listed).

Didicrum remulum
Quate & Brown 2004
, 11, figs. 15–17 ( 3 ). Type locality: ARGENTINA , Río Negro, Lago Morena. Distribution: ARGENTINA , only the type locality. Additional references:
Omad & Rossi 2012
, 66 (listed).

Didicrum simplex (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 25, pl. III, figs. 54–57 , as
Pericoma
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: ARGENTINA , Bariloche. Additional references:
Quate 1963
, 185, figs. 3 a–g, as
Didicrum
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 10, figs. 6–9 , as
Didicrum ;
Omad & Rossi 2012
, 66 (listed). Distribution: ARGENTINA , Bariloche, Chubut (Lago Puelo), Neuquén ( 17 km W Aluminé; 23 km NW Volcán La Angostura; San Martín de los Andes, Volcán Llanquin at 20 km S Confluencia), Río Negro (Nahuel Huapi at Lago Mascardi); CHILE , Llanquihue (Yerbas Buenas) (
Quate & Brown 2004
).

Didicrum solitarium (
Satchell) 1954
, 481, figs. 2 a–f, as
Pericoma solitaria
( 3 ). Type locality: north island of
NEW ZEALAND
, 110 km SE of Auckland, Te Aroha. Additional references:
Vaillant 1982
, 216, incorrect combination and lapsus ;
Duckhouse 1990
, 734, figs. 35–46 , ( 3 , Ƥ) as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
, the type locality and Auckland, Green Bay Beach.

Didicrum steffani (
Quate & Quate) 1967
, 37, figs. 15 a–f, as
Pericoma
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: NE NEW
GUINEA
, Kundiawa. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution: NEW
GUINEA
.

Didicrum triuncinatum (
Satchell) 1950
, 154, figs. 6 a–f, as
Pericoma triuncinata
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality:
NEW ZEALAND
, Aniseed Valley. Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution:
NEW ZEALAND
.

Didicrum uniformatum (Tonnoir)
1953, 419 , as
Pericoma uniformata
( 3 , Ƥ). Type locality: AUSTRALIA , King River ( holotype ), Cradle Valley (allotype female and male paratype ). Additional references:
Duckhouse 1990
, 737 (listed, as
Didicrum
);
Duckhouse & Lewis 1996
, 5 (catalog in line). Distribution: AUSTRALIA .

Didicrum viduatum (
Tonnoir) 1929
, 26, pl. IV, figs. 58–60 (Ƥ). Type locality: CHILE , Chiloe Island, Ancud. Additional references:
Enderlein 1937
, 105, as
Didicrum
;
Quate 1963
, 185, as
Didicrum
;
Quate & Brown 2004
, 12, fig. 25 , as
Didicrum
. Distribution: CHILE (only the type locality).
